properties.areaDesc: Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to Alabaster MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border; Lake Huron from Presque Isle Lt. to Sturgeon Point  MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 17 at 10:04AM EST until February 18 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 27 knots from the west
with gusts up to 37 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 7 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 10 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Huron from Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Point
MI beyond 5NM off shore and Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to
Alabaster MI beyond 5NM off shore.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 3 PM EST Tuesday
with the largest waves expected around 3 PM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON
